commit message: Reworked tablet layout.
Minor layout improvement in donate fragment.
Remove 20 character limit in ConnectDialog.
Fix NumberFormatException in settings.

Added user preference to keep screen on.

Fixes issue #48.
Keep screen on preference no longer requires restart and only works whilst connected to Clementine.

Merge pull request #49 from CalumMcCall/master

Added user preference to keep screen on.
Added option to change the increment by which the volume is changed, fixing issue #32.
Fixed some incorrect indentation.
Fixed inconsistent brackets.
Fixed else on wrong line.

Merge pull request #52 from CalumMcCall/master

Added option to change the increment by which the volume is changed, fix...

Fixed numerous warnings generated by Java and Lint.

Added baselineAligned option to main_activity.xml as suggested by Lint to increase performance.
Fixed spelling error in values-de/strings.xml (this maybe should be done on transifex?)
Removed several unused strings from values/strings.xml
Added suppression for Lint warning to ClementineExceptionHandler.java since hard-coding the date here is fine for debugging purposes.
Removed unused imports from ClementineLibraryDownloader.java, ConnectDialog.java and Security.java
Added warning suppression to ClementineSettings.java since deprecated methods will be removed during later refactoring.
Added locale-specific method calls to FileDialog.java to fix potential locale-specific bugs.
Added serialVersionUID to IabException.java to remove java warning about serializable interfaces.

Merge pull request #53 from CalumMcCall/master

Fixed numerous warnings generated by Java and Lint.

Remote pt_BR strings as android cannot handle them.
Fix crash in Downloads Fragment when Timer object wasn't present.

Reworked Playlist handling:
- Contextual menu (more holo like)
- Internal handling reworked.

TODO: Other icons for ActionMode
changed translation.

- CAB for library fragment (Android 3.0+).
- Icons for context menu.
- Active drawer menu item is highlighted now.
Add history of connected ips. Fixes #34.
Update menu item in main activity correctly.
Fix nullpointer in downloads fragment.
Automatic merge of translations from Transifex (https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/clementine-remote/resource/clementine-remote)

- Player notification has now high priority. Fixes #56.
- Lint warings for notification levels are now fixed.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/clementine-player/Android-Remote
Move playlist spinner in ActionBar and remove 2nd row. Fixes #62.
Fix ActionBar navigationmode.
Gradle build file + protobuf jar for IntelliJ

- Gradle includes all dependencies now.
- Remove now obsolete jar dependency files.
- Gradle script sets the versionName to git describe --tags.
- Incremented versionCode.

- Added signingConfigs (commented out as IntelliJ can't process Console Inputs)
- Only debug releases contain git commit hash.

- Rename build apks.
- Add ignore missing translations in xml files.

- Fix 'No storage device found!' when track, album or artist has invalid characters.
- Only rename release apk.
- Always add git revision information to versionName.
Add gradle wrapper.
Updated gitignore.
Set versionCode to commit count.
Update README with updated wiki link.
Compile using Java 1.7
White ActionMode buttons. Fixes issue #60.
Buildscript updated
Automatic merge of translations from Transifex (https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/clementine-remote/resource/clementine-remote)

Theme updated:
- ActionBar is now flat. Fixes #59.
- ActionBar icons are now white.
- White notificationbar icon. Fixes #55.
- White dialogs (ProgressDialog, AlertDialog) (Android 3.0+).
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'
Use System.console().readPassword instead of readLine for passwords when signing application.

- Orange ActionBar.
- Lyric download progressbar is now white, too.
Decode URL, so adding a file will work. Fixes #35.
- Removed song detail view from navigation drawer menu. It is now accessible with a swipe on the player view. Fixes #57.

- Reformat all xml files.
- Organized Imports.
Reformat Code.
Title TextView can now be two lines.
Fix player view.
Fix player ActionBar Title.
Set correct navigation mode in onResume for the playlist fragment.

Make sure fast scrolling is enabled when switching playlists.

More information: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/22287614
Apply Light theme globally and remove all in code theme settings.
Fix MenuItems in player view. Fixes #65.

Show proper message when search returns no results.

- Show Showcase in ConnectDialog
- Stop Discovery of Services when ConnectDialog is paused
- TargetAPI is now 11 due Showcase Library.
Oops
Moved Open Source licenses to a seperate settings item.
Remove deleted translations.
More Showcases
Library searches overall now, not only artist, album and title.
Minor style changes.
New page 'Connection'. It includes the ip you are currently connected to, the Clementine version, traffic stats and volume control (Fixes #50).
Obviously we should set the seekbar to the current volume and update it on changes...
Show connected time as well.
Show average traffic per second.
Removed now obsolete API checks & bump min SDK version to 15.
